org.svvrl.goal.core.io
Class OldAltAutomatonCodec

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      org.svvrl.goal.core.io.OldAutomatonCodec
          org.svvrl.goal.core.io.OldAltAutomatonCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
public class OldAltAutomatonCodec
extends OldAutomatonCodec

An OldAltAutomatonCodec can encode an alternating automaton in old GOAL file format (GFF) and decode an old GFF file back to an alternating automaton. This codec is part of OldGFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
